data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 15,526 believers in Coimbra, Portugal a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Coimbra, Portugal
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 425,674 lost in Coimbra that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 15,526 believers in Coimbra to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Coimbra, Portugal.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Jew, Portuguese-speaking people.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Coimbra, Portugal.
Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Coimbra. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Coimbra.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

location.name: Coimbra
location.cities_list: Coimbra, Figueira da Foz, Santo António dos Olivais, Condeixa-a-Nova, Tábua
location.cities_list_w_pop: Coimbra (106,582), Figueira da Foz (46,600), Santo António dos Olivais (38,936), Condeixa-a-Nova (17,078), Tábua (12,071)
